head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHERMAN, JUDGE RALPH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHERMAN, JUDGE RALPH

block.p: SHERMAN--Judge Ralph, passed away April 1, 2007, 90, of Boca Raton, FL, formerly of Queens. A New York State Supreme Court Justice, Queens County. Loving husband of Lillian for 67 years; adored father of Jeffrey (Melissa), Richard (Karen) and Robyn (John) Holzer; cherished grandfather of Gennifer, Lindsay, Chad, Courtney and Skylar; beloved brother of Sydney. Services Thursday April 5, 2007 10am at ''Guttermans'' 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury.
